subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah, the Triple Crown-winning colt, was named the world’s No. 1 racehorse for 2015 by the International Federation of Horseracing Authorities in London.
snippet: American Pharoah, the Triple Crown-winning colt, was named the world’s No. 1 racehorse for 2015 by the International Federation of Horseracing Authorities in London.
